articles.author: The Economist
articles.title: There is an explosive flaw in the plan to rearm Ukraine - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Europe lacks TNT and other propellants for shells and missiles | World News
articles.content: The scheme in question is called the Act in Support of Ammunition Production (ASAP), and three-quarters of the funding, or some 372m, will be lavished on manufacturers of things that go boom. Europe … [+4324 chars]
